&dhpackage;
video reader based on OpenCv which can dynamically crop video
&dhpackage;
filename.{avi|mpg|...} fifo
DESCRIPTION
&dhpackage; can be used to simulate movements of the camera by cropping the video frames with a given displacement. If can be controlled by feeding commands into a fifo.
ARGUMENTS
filename.{avi|mpg|...}
Defines some video file to view.
fifo
A named FIFO file to get commands from other processes.
